title: Are you a person of low desires? - Quora

response.answer_text: For some people they might say I have low desires, and for some, it is too much. And for me, I can't say it's low or not. Because I haven't reached most of the things that I desire; and when I reach it, I don't think it is high enough because it was reachable. The bottom line is, no desires are high or low, it is really up to us on how we see it.
